CustomField.description: The specific order to execute plugins within Logger's trigger framework. Plugins are executed in order by sorting by execution order, then plugin name (ORDER BY ExecutionOrder__c NULLS LAST, DeveloperName).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The specific order to execute plugins within Logger's trigger framework. Plugins are executed in order by sorting by execution order, then plugin name (ORDER BY ExecutionOrder__c NULLS LAST, DeveloperName).
CustomField.label: SObject Handler Execution Order
